urn:thisiskent-co-uk:thanet
<% each_article do |article| %>
<%= h(article[:headline]) %> urn:thisiskent-co-uk:<%= article[:id] %> <%= article[:date].iso8601 %> <%= article[:date].iso8601 %> <%= h(article[:content]) %> <content src="<%= h(article[:url]) %>" type="text/html" /> <link rel="alternate" href="<%= h(article[:url]) %>" type="text/html" />
<% end %>
